/** * Objects of this class contain the textual representation of * an XML schema annotation as well as information on the location * of the annotation in the document it originated from. * * @xerces.internal * * @author Michael Glavassevich, IBM * @version $Id: XSAnnotationInfo.java,v 1.1 2004/12/15 23:48:48 mrglavas Exp $ */
